name: Deep Fried Diner
description:
How Deep Fried Do You Want Your Burger?

In *Deep Fried Diner* you will work behind the counter of the titular diner, meet strange people and fry even stranger things. What are you waiting for? The game is playable directly in your browser and the current build was thoroughly fried, just for you!

How To Play

What To Expect?

- JUICY AUDIO

- PROCEDURAL GENERATED CHARACTERS

- NON PROCEDURAL HANDCRAFTED CHARACTERS

- FRYABLES

- FRYING BASKET WITH HOLES SO LARGE YOUR FRYABLES WONT STAY IN IF YOU'RE NOT CARFUL (wait thats a bad thing ...)
